alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 12 at 3:00PM MST until August 12 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE AREA EAST OF CROWN KING IN YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 255 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated that heavy rain has ended across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. A stream gauge on Black Canyon Creek showed a 3 foot rise. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Yavapai County This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Black Canyon, Castle Creek, Antelope Creek, Poland Creek, Turkey Creek and Crazy Basin Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
